title: Disgusting staff and service
text: The worst hotel I have ever been in my life came back after a business dinner at 10 tried the key didn't work to get me in through to the lifts came back to the the counter the European lady inside was in the bar and said to wait waited 20 minutes yes you heard it right 20 minutes had to press the buzzer again twice to get her attention as the lady came to the reception counter I was asked weather I knew how to use the key yes you have heard it right no apology for the wait no politeness but a Quote: unQuote: question do I know how to use the key yes I do madam she did the key gave me it door still not opened back to counter did I put it near a Mobile and first question again do I know how to use it I asked her come with me and you try she did it third time it worked of to the room the room not opening back again madam now the room door not opening madam it is not working now instead of me the paying guest getting angry the madam gets agitated and in anger does the key and asks me to follow her to the room she tried the key and the key didn't work so she tried her card key that didn't work she had to open it manually with a lock key I said madam now this is the fiin problem not my Fault no apology 10 minutes after been in the room get a call from reception that I swear to the lady and I should come down and apologise or I will be removed by the police now this is called customer service premiere in. Style our company will never use premier in. Again unless a full apology received and I would recommend any one visiting to let go of there integrity out on the door before checkinn
